Name: Gentleman's Agreement
Ingredients: 75 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Amaretto-like almond flavours with Tennessee whiskey balanced with fresh lemon juice and lengthened with refreshing soda.
History: A cocktail originally used by Brown-Forman to promote Gentleman Jack .
Nutrition: One serving of Gentleman's Agreement contains 216 calories
